creator: michael.michaels@ericsson.com
text:
ANT 1.9.7 is not working on HP-UX/Itanium. Ant seems to ignore all command line arguments including the target. T

Simple test with the following build.xml
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<project name="InstallationAutomikekyle">
     <echo message="outside any targets" />
        <target name="test" >
                <echo message="inside test target" />
        </target>
</project>

produces the following on Itanium (tested on 2 machines)
$ apache-ant-1.9.7/bin/ant test
Buildfile: /app/michaels/build.xml
     [echo] outside any targets
     [echo] outside any targets

BUILD SUCCESSFUL
Total time: 1 second

Notice "test" never gets called, note you can replace “test” with “junk” and get the same result. Trying Ant 1.9.6 works!

-bash-4.2$ /app/Telcordia/GraniteUpdater/tools/hudson.tasks.Ant_AntInstallation/ant_1.9.6/bin/ant test
Buildfile: /app/Telcordia/mike_kyle/build.xml
     [echo] outside any targets

test:
     [echo] inside test target

BUILD SUCCESSFUL
Total time: 0 seconds

There have been two changes to the wrapper script between 1.9.6 and 1.9.7 and I'd like to figure out, whether only one of them needs to be reverted or adapted or both of them,

One is commit 568c3ee https://git-wip-us.apache.org/repos/asf?p=ant.git;a=blobdiff;f=src/script/ant;h=6baf1212b6455eb330094799fff8a45af2778f6d;hp=4c1f7509bb3581b9f6e7e2d4b2842c544a5c473e;hb=568c3eeb96badf1e47380fd3e641cfc9a9ee935e;hpb=14e71c1a93be081c764e2fa54f957b907af6861d for Bug 58898 and, the other change is commit 14e71c1 https://git-wip-us.apache.org/repos/asf?p=ant.git;a=blobdiff;f=src/script/ant;h=4c1f7509bb3581b9f6e7e2d4b2842c544a5c473e;hp=b5ed5be6a8fe3a08d26dea53ea0fb3f5fab45e3f;hb=14e71c1a93be081c764e2fa54f957b907af6861d;hpb=790987e702966047b786f1fcbbbe554528f09d77 for Bug 58874

It would be great if you could try the wrapper scripts with either patch applied and tell us which combination breaks the build for you.
creator: bodewig@apache.org

text:
This may be a duplicate of Bug 59898 (which has been opened later than this one, but contained a proposed fix). Could you please give the current wrapper script <https://git-wip-us.apache.org/repos/asf?p=ant.git;a=blob_plain;f=src/script/ant;h=043f3fc20f8e26d76761d0efcd9d485078a81cca;hb=ad8630572286b10e845e74988b45028af3094266> a try and report whether the problem still exists?

Many thanks!
creator: bodewig@apache.org

text:

> one, but contained a proposed fix). Could you please give the current
> wrapper script

> ant;h=043f3fc20f8e26d76761d0efcd9d485078a81cca;
> hb=ad8630572286b10e845e74988b45028af3094266> a try and report whether the
> problem still exists?
>

Hi, sorry for butting in; not the original reporter, but just found this bug report, for the same reason (HP-UX B.11.31 on ia64), and the above fix seems to work for me.

ken1
creator: kenneth@olwing.se

text:
Many thanks for "butting in", Ken, this is very much appreciated.

We're currently updating the script in master based on feedback on the dev mailing list, it seems we still need a few more tweaks to get everything working. It would be great if you could help testing the current iteration of which we know it works on Solaris as well as Linux and Macs.
creator: bodewig@apache.org
bodewig@apache.org
text:
supposed to be fixed in 1.9.8 and 1.10.0

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 59898 ***
